items.title: Steep taxes can blunt premium play of alcohol companies
items.description: New taxes make premium products even more expensive for consumers

items.title: This is what it takes to create an Indian challenger to the ‘Big Four’
items.description: An economy that is forecast to break into the top three before the decade is over has an underwhelming global footprint in advisory and professional services. The government is trying to find ways to change status quo. More than regulatory tweaks, the main constraint for Indian firms may be their mindset, argues a ‘Big Four’ lifer

items.title: IEX shares crash 9% as market coupling fears return amid talk of stakeholder meet by Power Minister
items.description: The mechanism of market coupling will ensure buy and sell bids from all power exchanges in India will be aggregated and matched, in order to discover a uniform clearing price, which will result in only one price for the electricity that is to be traded through power exchanges.

items.title: Zydus planning a strategic revamp of Complan brand as wellness category evolves
items.description: The broader malt-based drinks market - once a staple in Indian homes - has seen its growth slow since the mid-2010s. Rising competition and evolving nutritional expectations have forced legacy brands to innovate.

items.title: Cyient: A rocky road to recovery
items.description: Leadership transition and macro-economic challenges weigh on the company’s outlook

items.title: Shaily Engineering — Healthcare helps it maintain sound health
items.description: The company has delivered a 193 percent return to investors since being recommended in our Discovery series

items.title: HPCL’s Vizag refinery to soon process more Russian and Arab sour crude in a boost for refining margins
items.description: A higher share of tougher or sour grade crude, which has higher sulphur content, would improve the refining margin of HPCL’s Vizag refinery to $12-14 per barrel from the current average of $8 per barrel.

items.title: India’s Data Centre Push: Building a resilient digital infrastructure
items.description: India's data centre ecosystem is pivotal to its digital growth. Strategic reforms in taxation, regulation, and infrastructure are essential to attract investment, enhance sustainability, and build global digital leadership

items.title: Royal Orchid Hotels: Will the growth strategy help the stock re-rate?
items.description: With a new brand architecture, a revamped loyalty rewards programme as well as property additions in key marquee markets, ROHL is well positioned to strengthen its presence in the hotel industry
